title: Mystery Skin Purchase
body: I bought a mystery skin and it subtracted RP from my account but I didn't get a dialogue box showing me what skin I recieved or any sort of indicator of what I got from the purchase. Is there any way to check besides just going through all of my champions and searching for a new skin?

replies.body: Protect your plushies and stuffed bundles of love with Ragdoll Poppy!  She was unlocked and ready to join you on the rift.  Congrats!

Same happened to me.

I`ve seen this kind of thread before and a Rioter told the OP which skin it was, so hopefully this happens with us too.

EDIT: Go to your purchase history, you can see the skin you got.
